item.description:
One of the most popular American cartoon icons is invading the city with a bar crawl that will not be soon forgotten. Where’s Waldo/Wanda Costumes are mandatory! Get your costume together, RSVP, join us and many more for this crazy fun bar crawl!

 

Costumes are readily available at Amazon. For a cheaper idea, buy some red duct tape at the home depot and stripe a white shirt.


 Cost:
• There is a $5 charge because the bar crawl is also a charity supporting Jumpstart. Jumpstart’s goal is to build literacy, language, social, and initiative skills in young children. They do this by pairing motivated college students, called Corps members, with preschool children in caring and supportive one-to-one relationships for an entire school year.
• Each of the scheduled bars will be providing a $3 or less drink.

• Cost of costume


Starting Point:
So that attendees can find each other before joining a sea of 300+ Waldos, we are going to meet  OFF the crawl list from 1-1:45pm upstairs at The Black Rose. I will also give my cell number to attendees in case anyone wants to find us later in the day.

Crawl Schedule:

1:00 - The Black Rose

1:45 – Hennessy’s

$3 Bud Light Drafts and Corona Lite Bottles

2:30 – Kitty O’Shea’s

$2 High Life & Rolling Rock

3:15 – The Place

$3 Waldo Wonder Drink

4:00 – Barney Fanning’s

PHOTO BOOTH!

$3 High Life or Naragansett

5:30 – Sissy K’s

$1.50 Bud Light Draft

6:15 – Hong Kong

We know you’ll get Scorpion Bowls but they have $1.75 Coors Light too

7:00 – The Wild Rover

$1.50 Bud Light Draft

 


Please also RSVP on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/events/327571893991303/


 Note: I consider Where’s Waldo an epic Fantasy Graphic Novel, so it definitely fits out Meetup theme!
item.name: Where's Waldo Bar Crawl
